What are the treatments for pontocerebellar hypoplasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of pontocerebellar hypoplasia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: EXOSC3-Related Pontocerebellar Hypoplasia  - Gene Review: Gene Review: TSEN54-Related Pontocerebellar Hypoplasia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Ponto
